name: TIME Doc!
description:
You went back in time to do the world something good. But it ended up destroying a big part of planet earth. Seeing the consequences of your time travel, you try to stop yourself traveling in the first place.

Controls

  • W - Jump
  • D - Move right
  • A - Move left
  • SPACE - Respawn

Credits

Code & Music - Diadas

Art - Jan Eilts

Assets Used

  • Universal Sound FX
  • Bolt
